failState.description: A Fail state stops the execution of the state machine and marks it as a failure.

Error.description: Provides an error name that can be used for error handling (Retry/Catch), operational, or diagnostic purposes.

Cause.description: Provides a custom failure string that can be used for operational or diagnostic purposes.

ErrorPath.description: Provides an error name that can be used for error handling (Retry/Catch), operational, or diagnostic purposes. Specified with JsonPath syntax or with Intrinsic Functions. The resulting value must be a string.

CausePath.description: Provides a custom failure string that can be used for operational or diagnostic purposes. Specified with JsonPath syntax or with Intrinsic Functions. The resulting value must be a string.
